actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications and the Internet

official_title: To ensure the efficient allocation of telephone numbers.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission: (1) to develop and implement a plan for the efficient allocation of telephone numbers; and (2) until it has fully implemented such plan and at the request of a State commission, to delegate its jurisdiction over telephone numbering to permit the State commission to implement measures to conserve telephone numbers.

titles.title: To ensure the efficient allocation of telephone numbers.
